attributes.action: All MP's who vote against their constituencies to be deselected.
attributes.additional_details: In 2016 the UK had a referendum to either Leave or Remain. No ifs or buts and no deal. Leave or Remain. Leave won by a fair majority. However, in most constituencies that demacratically voted to Leave it seams that the MP's want to go against the will of the electorate. This is not how a supposed democracy works and said MP's should be removed.
attributes.background: Democracy must be upheld. No member of Parliament should go against the electorate.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
